string-array.name: TODAYCOOKIES
string-array.item: Why don\'t you talk to someone step by step?
You\'re working hard on everything, so you\'ll be fine today.
Why don\'t you focus on yourself rather than on trivial matters?
Thinking positively can be a big help today.
The hard work will be finished and you will be able to relax.
There are days when it\'s good to let life go.
Everything will go smoothly. It\'s a really nice day!
How about taking a rest and having a comfortable day today?
You need time to solve your worries while recharging.
What is truly valuable can sometimes be acquired only through inefficient way.
There are times when you have to smile and move on even if you are not satisfied.
Everything depends on your mind.
The spirit can turn heaven into hell or hell into heaven. - Milton Silacone
There is no right time in life to set a goal. - Baldwin
Life is a tragedy at a close distance, a comedy at a distance. - Charlie Chaplin
Start for now. You can be perfect later. – Ron Moore
As long as there is life, there is hope. – Cicero
If you can\'t avoid it, enjoy it. - Robert Elliott
A great achievement begins with a small opportunity.
Don\'t match you with others.
Isn\'t life a series of self-repeating changes? - Andy Warhol
The person who paints a dream for a long time finally resembles it. - Andrémal
Don\'t underestimate yourself.
Don\'t misunderstand by expressing your opinion. Only active conversations and sincere actions can win the other person\'s heart.
There will be no problem if you continue to show your conviction as you have done so far.
How about building a relationship with confidence?
If you hurry, the tower that you worked on will collapse. Don\'t be impatient. Something good will happen soon.
Seek for happiness in the ordinary.

string-array.name: COMMONADVICE
string-array.item: If there\'s something you\'re concerned about, why don\'t you organize your thoughts in a memo?
If you focus on manual work such as sewing, you can get rid of distractions.
If you\'re stressed out or angry, try a \'fake smile\'.
Organize your messy room. If you focus on simple cleaning, you can get rid of negative emotions.
Blue stabilizes the nerves. Why don\'t you wear blue clothes when you\'re in a bad mood?
Enjoy music quietly or hum a song.
Try to spend more time with your pet.
There is a cycle in emotional change. The high and low periods are usually repeated every five weeks.
Walk lightly and happily.
If you have a headache, it can be helpful to write them down on paper and write down each solution and deadline.
Eat lots of fresh fruits and vegetables.
The evaluation of others is not very important.
People are not as interested in you as you think.
Don\'t push yourself too hard just because you failed.
\"This will pass as well.\" Everything will pass, so cheer up a little.
Make habits for the future, such as exercising and reading.

string-array.name: 불안
string-array.item: When you are anxious, why don\'t you prioritize and do high-priority things first?
When you\'re in a bad mood, stay away from negative information for a moment.
There is a study that shows that when you try to recall your anxious memories, you get a series of anxiety. Please avoid recalling your anxious memories.
When you have negative feelings, take a deep breath or drink water and get rest for a while.
Writing anxious emotions can calm you down. If you use words like \'feel\' or \'think\' at this time, the effect will be doubled!
Positive words relieve pain. Using optimistic words can alleviate anxiety.
Focus on what\'s happening right now. Anxiety is caused by focusing on the future.

string-array.name: 피로
string-array.item: When you\'re tired, reduce your SNS access time or cut it off for a while.
Did you know that you can be more tired if you don\'t move your body? If you haven\'t moved for a long time, try some light stretching.
Get warm sunshine for about 30 minutes.
Take nutritional supplements including magnesium and vitamin D.
A balanced diet and sufficient water intake are very helpful in relieving fatigue.
Are you getting good quality sleep? Check your sleep pattern.
Excessive caffeine intake can interfere with sleep and cause fatigue.
If you sleep too much, you can be rather tired. Get into the habit of sleeping around 7 hours between 10 p.m. and 7 a.m.
Using digital devices too often may be the cause of fatigue. Why don\'t you reduce the use of digital devices little by little?
You have to wake up on time on holidays to maintain a regular biorhythm.
Fill the bathtub with warm water and soak your body. It can relieve fatigue by promoting blood circulation.
Drink caffeine-free herbal tea. Herbs contain ingredients that reduce fatigue.
Stretching often can relieve clumps and promote blood circulation.
Provide enough nutrients to your body by eating fresh vegetables and fruits.
Please finish your dinner 3 hours before you go to bed. Late-night snacks can put pressure on your stomach.
Take psychological stability using aroma scent products.

string-array.name: 우울
string-array.item: Why don\'t you smile before you think about something? Sometimes a smile changes your emotion.
There\'s a saying, \"A thousand-mile journey starts with one step.\" Just take one step in the right direction.
Set three goals that you are confident of achieving. Setting specific and meaningful long-term goals is a way to take a step closer to happiness.
It\'s easy to think negative thoughts at night. Why don\'t you write a diary in the morning rather than at night?
Walk outdoors for more than an hour every day. Exercise can relieve depression by increasing the activity of dopamine and serotonin, the hormones that make you feel better.
Get warm sunshine for about 30 minutes.
Insomnia can worsen depression. Try to make a habit of sleeping and waking up at the same time every day.
If you increase your body temperature, you can relieve depression. Why don\'t you take a lower-body bath or go sauna to refresh yourself?
How about cleaning your room and decorating your house today?
Dance excitedly while listening to music. Or turn on the karaoke application and shout out loud. Stress would fly away!
Contact anyone and talk about things you haven\'t talked about.
Why don\'t you reach out to someone who needs my help? Feel proud while doing volunteer work.
There are many people who love you. Let your heart out to them.
Most of depressed people experience sleep disorders. Have you had a hard time falling asleep these days?
If nutrition is not balanced, it is easy to get depressed. What about checking your diet?
Do you know exactly why you\'re depressed? Write down the reason you\'re depressed on a piece of paper. Finding the exact cause can make it easier to control your emotions.
Sometimes go to a bookstore and read a book you\'re attracted to.

string-array.name: 스트레스
string-array.item: Good quality sleep significantly lowers stress.
You can reduce your stress by 25 percent if you exercise steadily every day.
Dance excitedly while listening to music. Or turn on the karaoke application and shout out loud. Stress would fly away.
Make plan for the day in the morning. And develop a habit of dealing with the three most important tasks first.
Don\'t you have too much perfectionism? It\'s hard to do everything perfectly. Manage your stress effectively by prioritizing properly.
Isn\'t the break time too short? It\'s good to drink water every 1-2 hours or take a short walk and relax.
Getting a hold of your breath when you have a lot of stress can be very helpful in managing your mood.
Yoga is a good exercise to relieve tension and improve concentration. Why don\'t you give it a try?
Isn\'t there too many things that interfere with your daily life? Reduce time checking SNS, e-mails, text messages, and more.
Is there a place where you usually feel calm? When you\'re stressed out, try healing in that place.
Have you ever felt anxiety or palpitations after drinking caffeine? Then it\'s better to reduce your daily caffeine intake.
Write down the things you were grateful for in your life. You will find the precious value of everyday life.
Laugh out loud while watching funny videos, performances, etc.
Look back on your own mind and look into your mind. Thinking about what you really want will help you understand more about yourself.
If you want to relieve stress quickly, chew gum.
Use essential oils or scented candles with your favorite scent.
Did you take on something you didn\'t want because you couldn\'t say no? Make it a habit to refuse things you don\'t like.

string-array.name: 좌절
string-array.item: Understand your strengths and weaknesses and set the right goals.
Anyone can make mistakes in their lives.
Don\'t evaluate yourself based on what others have achieved.
Everyone has a negative side. In what part do you feel inferior?
Positive self-assertion creates courage and speculation. Shout out, \'I can do anything!\'
Are you looking at your weaknesses and overlooking your strengths? Don\'t be so hard on yourself.
Recognizing the problem correctly and looking straight at the substance is the first step to solve the problem. You can do it!
The world is not always fair. The occasional misfortune is inevitable, so think, \'This will pass, too.\'
Set a reasonable goal and achieve it. It will be an opportunity to increase your self-esteem.
It\'s natural to have negative feelings after failure. Feel the emotions as much as you want and you\'ll get relieved.

string-array.name: 자존감
string-array.item: Aren\'t you comparing yourself to others too much? Focus on what you want instead of comparing it to others.
Try to think positively.
Too big and ambitious goals are likely to lead to failure. Set a feasible, short-term goal.
Are you avoiding reality? Even if it\'s hard, face the reality and get through it little by little.
Have a habit of exercising regularly. Your self-esteem will go up a lot.
Try to say \'I can do it\' frequently. And if you achieve your goal well, compliment yourself.
Why don\'t you learn a new instrument or exercise? Or you can start a small hobby such as knitting.
Try light exercise three times a week for 30 minutes.
Meditation, yoga, and gardening are good activities that make you calm and positive.
Eating a meal with nutritious foods is important for controlling emotions.
You\'ve achieved more than you thought. Look back at photos, and souvenirs. Or read a notebook or diary you wrote before
Why don\'t you take a one-day class? You might find a new talent.
Why don\'t you reach out to someone who needs your help? Do volunteer work and feel proud.

string-array.name: SLEEPADVICE
string-array.item: Please avoid bright light after sunset.
Take a walk in the sun during the day.
Make comfortable sleeping environment. Too cold or hot temperature can interfere with your sleep.
Use a bed or bedroom for sleeping purposes only.
Avoid surfing the Internet or watching videos in bed.
You can sleep more effectively if you make repeated routines as a preparation step before going to bed.
Please avoid caffeine before going to bed.
It\'s better to avoid eating three hours before going to bed.
Are you too nervous before going to bed? Relax and go back to sleep.
It\'s better not to do anything except sleeping in bed.
Please avoid looking at your smartphone in bed.
When you\'re not sleepy, it\'s better not to lie in bed.
If you can\'t sleep in bed and your thoughts are connected, your brain recognizes that the bed is a place to think.
For a regular life, it is important to set the \'wake-up time\' as well as the bedtime.
If you wake up late, you get sleep late.
Go to the window just after waking up in the morning. It will help you improve your sleep pattern.
If you intentionally darken your surroundings before going to bed, you can sleep more easily.
Muscle exercise improves the quality of sleep.
Opening curtains helps maintain a regular sleep pattern.
Don\'t rely too much on repeated alarm.
Change your clothes as soon as you wake up.
Eat sweets in the morning.
If you eat a sufficient breakfast and a light dinner, it is easy to control your biorhythm.
Don\'t sleep all at once on holidays. Try to keep the difference between waking hours on weekdays and holidays less than 3 hours.
If you sleep with your ankles warm, you can fall asleep easily.
It\'s not good to watch sleep-inducing videos lying on your bed.
Read books on paper rather than smartphones before going to bed.
Avoid high-intensity exercise in the evening. Rather, do housework or light walks.
If you\'re worried about snoring, roll your body sideways and sleep.
If you\'re sleepy all day, analyze the sleepy time.
Try to refrain from habitual caffeine consumption.
